products.title: Logitech V220 Cordless Optical Mouse for Notebooks
products.description:
The Logitech V220 Cordless Optical Mouse for Notebooks is a cordless optical mouse that connects to Windows, Macintosh, and Linux notebook via a wireless 2.4GHz plug-n-play USB receiver. It is relatively inexpensive at $29.99, available in eight different colors, and ergonomically designed for long-term use. The technology utilized is high-definition optical, which can render tracking up to 1000dpi. Additional features include a battery indicator light, an automatic sleep mode that turns off the mouse when you’re not using it, and side-to-side scrolling.

Features

  • Cordless Optical Mouse
  • 2.4GHz USB Receiver
  • Ergonomic Design
  • Two Buttons
  • Scroll Wheel
  • Battery Indicator
  • Automatic Sleep
  • Side-to-Side Scrolling

Specifications

  • Part Numbers (1): PN 910-001463, PN 910-001468, PN 910-001469
  • Part Numbers (2): PN 910-001467, PN 910-001466, PN 910-001465
  • Part Numbers (3): PN 910-001464, PN 910-000153
  • Compatibility (Win): XP, Vista, 7
  • Compatibility (Mac): OS X 10.4+
  • Compatibility (Linux): Kernel 2.6+
  • Batteries: 1 AA
  • Warranty: 3 Year
